name: Ninetales

attacks.name: Lure
attacks.text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, choose 1 of them and switch it with his or her Active Pokemon.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Ninetales in order to use this attack.

flavorText: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

strengths: Lure provides built-in Gust of Wind effect
Fire Blast deals 80 damage - high for Stage 1
Can target evolving basics before they evolve
weaknesses: Must discard energy for Fire Blast
80 HP is moderate for a Stage 1
counters: Energy Removal - Slows Fire Blast setup

competitiveHistory: Ninetales was valued for its Lure attack, which provided free Gust of Wind utility every turn. This made it effective at disrupting opponent's setup and picking off weak bench Pokemon. It saw play in Fire-based decks as a versatile attacker.

rulings.ruling: Lure cannot be used if your opponent has no Benched Pokemon.
You must discard 1 Fire Energy to use Fire Blast. If you cannot, you cannot use the attack.
